fullText: The immersive Broadway musical about Imelda Marcos is a dazzling spectacle that doesn't shy away from the complicated politics of its subject matter.
dtliExcerpt: The immersive Broadway musical about Imelda Marcos is a dazzling spectacle that doesn't shy away from the complicated politics of its subject matter.
